name: fsl_anat
description: General pipeline for processing anatomical images (e.g. T1-weighted scans) via FSL tools. The stages include reorienting the images to the standard (MNI) orientation [fslreorient2std], automatically cropping the image [robustfov], bias-field correction (RF/B1-inhomogeneity-correction) [FAST], registration to standard space (linear and non-linear) [FLIRT and FNIRT], brain-extraction [FNIRT-based or BET], tissue-type segmentation [FAST], and subcortical structure segmentation [FIRST]

inputs.name: Input file
inputs.description: Input image file (for single-image use), such as .nii.gz. Either this or an input dir (-d) must be specified, but not both.

inputs.name: Input Dir
inputs.description: Existing input directory (.anat extension) where this script will be run in place. Either this or an input file (-i) must be specified, but not both.

inputs.name: Output directory
inputs.description: Specifies the output folder name. Note that the .anat extension is automatically appended.

inputs.name: Clobber flag
inputs.description: If .anat directory exist (as specified by -o or default from -i) then delete it and make a new one.

inputs.name: Weak bias flag
inputs.description: Used for images with little and/or smooth bias fields. For images acquired using birdcage coils or on 1.5T scanners, the --weakbias option will be faster and may produce equally good results.

inputs.name: No reorienation flag
inputs.description: Turn off step that does reorientation 2 standard (fslreorient2std).

inputs.name: No automated cropping flag
inputs.description: Turn off step that does automated cropping (robustfov).

inputs.name: No bias field correction flag
inputs.description: Turn off steps that do bias field correction (via FAST).

inputs.name: No registration flag
inputs.description: Turn off steps that do registration to standard (FLIRT and FNIRT).

inputs.name: No non-linear registration flag
inputs.description: Turn off step that does non-linear registration (FNIRT).

inputs.name: No tissue-type segmentation flag
inputs.description: Turn off step that does tissue-type segmentation (FAST).

inputs.name: No subcortical segmentation flag
inputs.description: Turn off step that does sub-cortical segmentation (FIRST).

inputs.name: No search in linear registration flag
inputs.description: Specify that linear registration uses the -nosearch option (FLIRT).

inputs.name: Bias field smoothing value
inputs.description: Specify the value for bias field smoothing (the -l option in FAST).

inputs.name: Image type
inputs.description: Specify the type of image (choose one of T1 T2 PD - default is T1).

inputs.name: F-parameter value for BET
inputs.description: specify the f parameter for BET (only used if not running non-linear reg and also wanting brain extraction done).

output-files.name: Output folder
output-files.description: A folder containing the output files for fsl_anat. Includes outputs for the images, reorientation, cropping, bias correction, registration, brain extraction, and segmentation.

groups.name: Input Data
groups.description: Either a single structural image file (e.g. .nii.gz) or directory (.anat extension) may be given as input

groups.name: Optional Parameters
groups.description: Parameters for controlling the execution of the fsl_anat task
